kpi.name: M1034C1

kpi_info.title: INTER SYSTEM HHO RT SUCCESS PER OPER
kpi_info.use: "The number of successful inter-system handovers for RT. The call is considered as RT from handover point of view when at least one RT RABs exist.Only the SRNC can update the counter. This counter is updated in the cell that is the best cell in the active set on the SRNC side when the RNC starts the HHO attempt UPDATED: When the CN (core network) initiates the release of the Iu connections to the source RNC by sending the RANAP:IU RELEASE COMMAND message after successful inter-system handover."

kpi.kpi_alias: INTER SYSTEM HHO RT SUCCESS PER OPER
